sentences.en: A neutron is simply a neutral particle in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.cn: 中子就是原子核里不带电的粒子。

sentences.en: Electrons in atoms are visualized as diffuse clouds surrounding the nucleus.
sentences.cn: 原子中的电子可以想像为弥漫在原子核周围的电子云.

sentences.en: In nuclear resonance, the nucleus is disturbed by motions.
sentences.cn: 在核共振中核子受到运动的干扰.

sentences.en: Neutrons and protons are bound together in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.cn: 在原子核里，中子和质子是结合在一起的。

sentences.en: The immature neutrophil has a nonsegmented nucleus in shape of a horseshoe.
sentences.cn: 很幼稚的嗜中性粒细胞的核呈马蹄形,不分叶.

sentences.en: The most important part of the cell is the nucleus.
sentences.cn: 细胞中最重要的部分是细胞核.

sentences.en: The nucleus decays into three particles which go off in separate directions.
sentences.cn: 这个核衰变成飞向不同方向的三个粒子.

sentences.en: The nucleus of an atom consists of neutrons, protons and other particles.
sentences.cn: 原子核由中子 、 质子和其他粒子构成.

sentences.en: the nucleus of an effective team
The particles can be detected with a condensation nucleus counter.
sentences.cn: 这种粒子可以用凝结核计数器探测到.

sentences.en: The repulsive force within the nucleus is enormous.
sentences.cn: 核子内部的斥力是巨大的。

sentences.en: The residual nucleus will, in general, undergo a radioactive transformation.
sentences.cn: 剩余核一般说来将发生一次放射性衰变.

sentences.en: These paintings will form the nucleus of a new collection.
sentences.cn: 这些画将构成新的收藏系列的基础。

sentences.en: These young people formed the nucleus of the club.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人成了俱乐部的核心.

sentences.en: Within a nucleus, it can acquire an infinite lifetime.
sentences.cn: 在原子核内, 中子可以获得无限长的寿命.

phrases.tran_cn: 杏仁核；扁桃状核；杏仁巢

trans.tran_en: the central part of an atom, made up of neutrons, protons, and other elementary particles
